name: Liberball Tournament
description:
Liberball Tournament is a very simple game that I made to use in a Construct 2 class.
It is a remake of a minigame that was in my 2005 game "Bernard and Hank" that was more fun than the main game.

It is like Pong, but with a bouncing ball. You can play against a (at the moment weak) CPU player or against a human player.

This is just the basic game, more features might be added as the class progresses. 

Controls:
Player 1: arrow keys
Player 2: WASD
